homepage_subtitle: The simple, free, and private way to read your e-books.

feature_1.title: Instant & Free
feature_1.description: No installation or registration needed. Upload your EPUB and start reading instantly. Our service is completely free and ad-free, designed for immediate access to your stories.

feature_2.title: Privacy First
feature_2.description: We champion your privacy. Your files are processed locally in your browser and are never uploaded to our servers. Your books remain yours, always.

feature_3.title: Customizable Experience
feature_3.description: Tailor your reading environment. Adjust font size, and line height, and choose between single or two-page layouts for maximum comfort.

feature_4.title: Works On Any Device
feature_4.description: Enjoy a seamless reading experience on any desktop, tablet, or smartphone. Our responsive design adapts to your screen, so you can read anywhere.

feature_5.title: Fast & Efficient
feature_5.description: Built with modern web technologies, our reader is lightweight and performance-optimized, ensuring your books load quickly and run smoothly.

feature_6.title: Easy Navigation
feature_6.description: Effortlessly browse your book with the integrated table of contents or jump directly to any page. Reading should be simple, and we make sure it is.

how_it_works_title: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps

how_it_works_steps.step_1: Click 'Upload a Book' and select an EPUB file from your device.
how_it_works_steps.step_2: The book instantly opens in a clean, distraction-free reader.
how_it_works_steps.step_3: Use the menu to customize your reading experience and navigate chapters.

faq_items.a1: Yes, ePub Reader is completely free to use, with no hidden costs or advertisements. Our goal is to provide a simple, accessible reading tool for everyone.
faq_items.q2: Are my books safe? Are they stored anywhere?
faq_items.a2: Your privacy is our top priority. Your files are never uploaded or stored on any server. The EPUB file is opened and processed directly within your web browser.
faq_items.q3: What devices can I use this on?
faq_items.a3: Our reader is a web-based application, which means it works on any device with a modern browser, including desktops (Windows, macOS, Linux), tablets (iPad, Android), and smartphones (iPhone, Android).
